Text: Sample? This can't be HD as there is no HD version available...

@GoodFilms
It appears you're right. The Blu-Ray release will only be in November 2010. Therefore, this then has to be a DVD upscale, I've included it in the description, thanks. But the quality is pretty good.

Screenshots: 
http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/343/christmascarol20091.png
http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/4458/christmascarol20092.png

But if you are picky and want TRUE 720p, then you will just have to wait until the official Blu-Ray release I guess. Sorry for any confusion/inconvenience. But like I mentioned in the description: this is only a convert of another rip out there.
A DVD rip is a DVD rip and in no way HD, no matter what you do to it.
